name: A blood-seeping tourniquet
data: It increases the users constitution a good amount.
It increases the users wisdom a tiny bit.
It has non-existent armour class for its type (non-existent in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration slightly.
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration pitifully.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It gives decent bonus to the skill 'mastery of medicine'.
